entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 9 except minus 15 in low lying areas. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast late this evening and overnight. Low minus 9 except minus 15 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 6.
